column3: I believe that you control your destiny, that you can be what you want to be. You can also stop and say, 'No, I won't do it, I won't behave his way anymore. I'm lonely and I need people around me, maybe I have to change my methods of behaving,' and then you do it.
The future starts today, not tomorrow.

We are called to be architects of the future, not its victims.
I try to learn from the past, but I plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present. That's where the fun is.
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.
